Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
Class to implement the rendering of our scene

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  Render.Pixel
    Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of.
    static class  Render.RenderBuilder
    Buider of the rendering motor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void defaultRender​(boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid
    void printGrid​(int interval, Color color)
    Create a grid [over the picture] in the pixel color map. given the grid's step and color.
    private void renderImage​(Options opt, boolean isSoftShadows)
    This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object
    void renderImage​(Options opt1, Options opt2)
    Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid
    private void renderImageAdaptive​(boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid Use of AntiAliasing method that is shooting lots of beams in place of only one in the center of the pixel
    private void renderImageWithAntialiasing​(boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render the image by writing every pixel by launching into it N*M rays to get the more closest color of the real image ,in order to avoid aliasing
    private void renderImageWithDepthOfField​(boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render the image with implementation of the depth of field
    private Color renderPixel​(double nX, double nY, int depth, Ray firstRay, boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render every pixel by calling recursive adaptive render function
    private Color renderPixelRecursive​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​ColoredRay> myRays, double nX, double nY, int depth, boolean isSoftShadows)
    Render the pixel by doing recursion until the color is the same in all the 5 rays or end of depth
    Render setDebugPrint()
    Set debug printing on
    Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
    Set multithreading
    - if the parameter is 0 - number of cores less 2 is taken
    void writeToImage()
    Write the image

  • Method Details

    • renderImage

      private void renderImage​(Options opt, boolean isSoftShadows)
      This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object
      Parameters:
      opt - Option of rendering
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement

    • setMultithreading

      public Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
      Set multithreading
      - if the parameter is 0 - number of cores less 2 is taken
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads
      Returns:
      the Render object itself

    • setDebugPrint

      public Render setDebugPrint()
      Set debug printing on
      Returns:
      the Render object itself

    • renderImage

      public void renderImage​(Options opt1, Options opt2) throws jdk.jshell.spi.ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException
      Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid
      Parameters:
      opt1 - first improvement option
      opt2 - second improvement option
      Throws:
      jdk.jshell.spi.ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException - if improvement not implemented

    • defaultRender

      private void defaultRender​(boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid
      Parameters:
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement

    • renderImageWithAntialiasing

      private void renderImageWithAntialiasing​(boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render the image by writing every pixel by launching into it N*M rays to get the more closest color of the real image ,in order to avoid aliasing
      Parameters:
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement

    • renderImageWithDepthOfField

      private void renderImageWithDepthOfField​(boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render the image with implementation of the depth of field
      Parameters:
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement

    • renderImageAdaptive

      private void renderImageAdaptive​(boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render the image by writing every pixel of the grid Use of AntiAliasing method that is shooting lots of beams in place of only one in the center of the pixel
      Parameters:
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement

    • renderPixel

      private Color renderPixel​(double nX, double nY, int depth, Ray firstRay, boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render every pixel by calling recursive adaptive render function
      Parameters:
      nX - nb of pixels in col
      nY - nb of pixels in row
      depth - depth of recursion
      firstRay - first ray traced in center of the pixel
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel

    • renderPixelRecursive

      private Color renderPixelRecursive​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​ColoredRay> myRays, double nX, double nY, int depth, boolean isSoftShadows)
      Render the pixel by doing recursion until the color is the same in all the 5 rays or end of depth
      Parameters:
      myRays - the rays
      nX - nb of pixels in col
      nY - nb of pixels in row
      depth - recursion depth
      isSoftShadows - is rendering with soft shadows improvement
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid​(int interval, Color color)
      Create a grid [over the picture] in the pixel color map. given the grid's step and color.
      Parameters:
      interval - grid's step
      color - grid's color

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      Write the image
